name: Transfez
headline: Brex for small businesses in Indonesia

founders.name: Bondan Herumurti, Founder
founders.description: CTO of Transfez. I’ve been on tech industry from 2010, being a witness the rise of Groupon. Starting as developer on Web Technology CSS 2.0, and watch the scene moving toward mobile. Infrastructure growing from bare metal, cPanel until a modern containerization. For me it always been fascinating to become a part of tech community moving very fast from an era to another era.

## Smart Solutions That Redefine Business Finance
## Corporate Card
## International Transfer
## Local Transfer
## Bill Payment
## Reimbursement
## Payroll
![image](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fcard.2d9157ed.png&w=1920&q=75)
## Corporate Card
## Corporate Card That Put You In Charge
## Discover lightning-fast card issuance and take control of your finances with adjustable spending limits. Gain real-time insight into your team's spending for complete visibility and efficient management.
## [Get to know more >](https://neo.transfez.com/</cards>)
![image](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Finter.14208731.png&w=1920&q=75)
## International Transfer
## Bridging The Gap In Global Payments
## Slash your international payment costs by up to 60% with our competitive fee while effortlessly make payments to over 60 countries worldwide and streamline your transfers using our easy-to-use platform.
## [Get to know more >](https://neo.transfez.com/</international-transfer>)
![image](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flocal.6c6ec551.png&w=1920&q=75)
## Local Transfer
## Streamline Your Local Transfer Process with Ease
## Effortlessly transfer money with instant access to 150+ Indonesian banks and e-wallets. Initiate transactions to thousands of bank account in a few clicks and enjoy free, 24/7 local transfers for your business.
## [Get to know more >](https://neo.transfez.com/</local-transfer>)
![image](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbill.7e47ee8f.png&w=1920&q=75)
## Bill Payment
## Manage Account Payable Without Hassle
## Discover a seamless automated invoice payment system, powered by AI, to ease your finance team's workload. Eliminate manual data entry by capturing and digitizing payment details, boosting efficiency and productivity while reducing paperwork.
## [Get to know more >](https://neo.transfez.com/</bill-payment>)
![image](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Freimburse.6015ada6.png&w=1920&q=75)
## Reimbursement
## Effortless Reimbursement For Your Employee Expenses
## Boost finance team productivity by removing manual expense tracking and payouts. Effortlessly submit reimbursements anytime, anywhere—simply snap a receipt photo, upload for approval, and receive automatic reimbursement.
## [Get to know more >](https://neo.transfez.com/</reimbursement>)
![image](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpayroll.b5636fe2.png&w=1920&q=75)
## Payroll
## Smart Solution For Payroll Management
## Lighten your payroll burden with our efficient solution that saves time and money. Pay thousands of employee salaries in less than 5 clicks 24/7, while establishing role segregation between HR and Finance for better data confidentiality.
## [Get to know more >](https://neo.transfez.com/</payroll>)
![icon-image](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/static/media/1-two-tone.b8cd598b.svg)
## Full Control
## Ensure accountability with automated approval workflows
![icon-image](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/static/media/2-two-tone.dca09f1e.svg)
## Dynamic Spending Tracking
## Provides deep, real-time insights to help you make informed decisions
![icon-image](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/static/media/3-two-tone.10e1bc68.svg)
## Increased Efficiency
## Optimize your company's finance with ease, reducing hassle and save up precious time
## Client Stories
### Empowering businesses across sectors, stages, and categories to build sustainable companies
![icon-image](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/static/media/biteship-logo.460cc0d3.svg)
## “After incorporating Jack into our operations, I have noticed a significant improvement in the organization and structure of our financial records. Also, it allows me to receive the report faster.”
##### Mohamad Emirsaid Sadikin
##### CEO & Co-Founder of Biteship
![icon-image](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/static/media/schoters-logo.7148753d.svg)
## “Compare with conventional credit card, Jack virtual card is much more user friendly and reliable!Also, its cross border payment facility really ease the payment process to the international bank.We are a satisfied user of Jack!”
##### Radyum Ikono
##### CEO & Co-Founder of Schoters
![icon-image](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/static/media/kasual-logo.f3e7b151.svg)
## “Kasual's pace has significantly increased after we started utilizing Jack; previously, our financial bureaucracy consumed a significant amount of time. Now, with Jack, everything is automated, approvals can be processed automatically.”
##### Alam Akbar
##### CEO & Founder of Kasual
## Small Wonders, Big Impact
## Discover ingenious touches that make all the difference.
![imagepicker](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmask-group-newXL.36951994.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Never miss any payment deadline by planning and scheduling your expenses ahead. Set schedule to pay immediately, at a specific time, or follow your company’s payment cycle.
![imagepicker](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmask-groupxl.c1265e35.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Tailor roles and regulate access with individual permissions.
![imagepicker](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmask-group-2xl.cf83b288.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Automated workflow to ensure all transactions are reviewed and approved by the appropriate parties according to your company policies.
![imagepicker](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmask-group-3xl.e91e67be.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Leave a lasting impression on your customers with a personalized transfer receipt that represents your company identity.
![imagepicker](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmask-group-4xl.60354fb9.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Simplify approvals on the move with our mobile app, crafted to accommodate the busy schedules of executives and decision makers.
![button-prev](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/static/media/card-prev.f3e57737.svg)![button-next](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/static/media/card-next.21ce4bae.svg)
## Safeguarding Your Transactions and Data
![icon-image](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/static/media/4-two-tone.a3a9267d.svg)
## Data Privacy
## Role segregation will keep data confidentiality compartmentalized and can only be accessed by authorized users.
![icon-image](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/static/media/5-two-tone.c9c237d3.svg)
## Uncompromised Security
## Data encryption and advanced security protocols ensure your financial data is always safe.
![icon-image](https://neo.transfez.com/_next/static/media/6-two-tone.9074c83f.svg)
## Licensed
## Regulated by Bank Indonesia as Payment Service Provider with License No. 13/77/DASP/30 
## Put Your Finances on Autopilot
## GET STARTED
## GET STARTED

generated_description:
**Transfez: Redefining Financial Solutions for Small Businesses in Indonesia**

Founded in 2020 and based in Jakarta, Indonesia, Transfez is on a mission to become the "Brex for small businesses." This ambitious fintech startup is part of Y Combinator’s Batch W22, which adds a layer of credibility and guidance to their journey. With a dedicated team of around 50 employees, the company aims to simplify financial management for businesses across Indonesia.

### What Does Transfez Offer?

Transfez provides a robust suite of financial management solutions tailored for small and medium enterprises (SMEs). Their offerings include:

1. **Corporate Cards**: Both physical and virtual cards that can be issued instantly, giving businesses full control over spending.
  
2. **International Transfers**: A cost-effective and efficient solution for companies needing to send money abroad, currently serving over 60 countries.

3. **Local Transfers**: Seamless access to over 150 Indonesian banks and e-wallets, allowing free and instantaneous transactions.

4. **Bill Payments**: Advanced software to automate approvals and streamline payment processes, which helps reduce manual workloads.

5. **Payroll**: An efficient payroll system that simplifies salary payments for large teams, achieving this in just a few clicks.

6. **Reimbursements**: A straightforward mechanism for employees to submit expense claims, enhancing the overall speed and efficiency of reimbursements.

7. **Virtual Accounts**: Instant payment reception capabilities from any bank, further simplifying transactions.

### Why Choose Transfez?

Transfez isn’t just about financial transactions; it focuses on empowering businesses by making finance more manageable:

- **Real-Time Spending Insights**: Companies get a clear view of their finances, allowing for informed decision-making.
  
- **Automated Workflows**: Automated approval processes help maintain control and compliance within organizations.

- **User Experience**: Feedback from clients suggests that the platform is user-friendly, leading to increased efficiency and reduced bureaucratic overhead.

### Client Testimonials

Transfez has earned the trust of its users, ranging from startups to well-established enterprises. Clients like Biteship and Kasual have shared significant improvements in their financial operations since utilizing Transfez, emphasizing enhanced organization, speed, and automation.

### Getting Started

If you’re looking to simplify financial management for your business in Indonesia, Transfez could be the right partner. They promise a solution that lets you focus on growth rather than getting bogged down by financial bureaucracy.

For more details, you can check their offerings [here](https://neo.transfez.com) and see how they can help elevate your business to the next level.
